[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Social Media Marketing Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]What is Social Media Marketing?

• Use Social Media websites like Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc. to market your business.
• Social Media Marketing is a cost-effective way of marketing your business online.
• Social Media Marketing is promoting the company brand and its products using various available social media channels.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]How Can We Assist in Social Media Marketing Services?

• Creating Social Media Strategy (Most Important)
• Creating/Reviewing content
• Promoting Facebook page, Instagram page and Linkedin page, etc.
• Verify your social media performance & do social media management[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Primary Objectives:

• Brand Building
• Creating Visibility
• Increasing footprints of the site[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10372″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Why does it work?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • Social media marketing services help you to reach the audience that matters most to your business
  • Remarket to site visitors, email subscribers. Also, generate brand awareness
  • Use artificial intelligence and machine learning for data-backed targeting and messaging
  • Build cost-effective, result-driven campaigns that achieve your advertising goals
  • Optimize your ad spend to maximize your ROI & results

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Why Choose Digital Consulting Pandit as a Social Media Marketing Agency?

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Exclusive strategy planning & execution

Custom ad strategy for each of your selected platforms
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Quality service

Dedicated expert, Fast setup of ad accounts, Quick response times
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Real Results

We focus on ROI driven results from social media marketing
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”FAQs” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”What is Social Media Marketing?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Social media marketing (SMM) is a marketing method that uses social media websites and social networks to market a company’s products and services. Also, it is the process of creating engaging content for top social media platforms to drive engagement and promote your business.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What Are the Benefits of Social Media for business?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Social media marketing services have various advantages for startups and established businesses. With the correct social media marketing strategy and campaign monitoring system, social media content marketing can be a game-changer for your business as it leads to increased search traffic, better SEO, healthier customer engagement, and improved brand trust & visibility.

The top benefits of Social media marketing services are:

  • Growing your brand awareness
  • Provide Exceptional Customer Service
  • Establish Your Brand As A Topical Authority
  • Target Your Correct Audience
  • Keep Your Customers Up-To-Date
  • Generate A Conversation Around Your Brand

[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Why Does Your Business Need To Hire A Social Media Marketing Consultant?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]A social media marketing consultant will assist you to review the specific needs of your business. They will guide & highlight where your social media campaign is strong and in what areas you are lacking, most importantly they will help you to build your brand on top social media platforms. A digital marketing consultant creates the best social media marketing strategy to reach an expanded audience & leave them with a positive and long-lasting impression of your brand.

Here are the top reasons for hiring a Social Media Marketing Consultant for your business:

  • A social media consultant helps you improve your business.
  • A social media consultant makes your band access easier.
  • A social media consultant is your brand advocate.
  • A social media consultant helps your brand to stay ahead of your competitors.
  • A social media consultant gets the best social media marketing strategy & brand building strategy.
  • A social media consultant Manage your Social Media Marketing In-house.

[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”What are the types of social media marketing?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Social Media Marketing is the most inexpensive and economical way to reach the target market, regardless of your business type.

  • Different types or forms of Social Media Marketing
  • Sharing of content on social media
  • Networking services for Social Media
  • Building services through community
  • Social Geolocation and meeting services

[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What Is Social Media Management?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Social media management is a method of creating, publishing, promoting, and managing content across social media channels like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, & more. Social media management also includes engaging with your audience and looking for new opportunities to increase reach and visibility.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” bg_color_value=”__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Connect with a top social media advertising agency!” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” css=”.vc_custom_1598697755693{margin-top: 22px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”If you’ve been searching, “best social media marketing agency near me,” look no further than Digital Consulting Pandit.” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_btn title=”Get a Quote!” style=”custom” custom_background=”#2a2a2a” custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Choose the Proper Platform for Social Media Management” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

  • Our strategists & social media specialists can help your business choose the best platforms for your social media ad management services & return better results.
  • While there are various social media advertising platforms on the Internet that have paid advertising options, it’s essential to choose the platform that will help you to reach a relevant audience.
  • When it comes to your social media campaign there is some big network platform in the game that should be considered. These networks are…

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”10377″ img_size=”80×80″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Facebook” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”10381″ img_size=”80×80″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Twitter” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”10383″ img_size=”80×80″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Youtube” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”10384″ img_size=”80×80″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Instagram” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”10385″ img_size=”80×80″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”LinkedIn” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”10386″ img_size=”80×80″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Pinterest” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Related Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
